# Why do I get Error 2 / Error 3? {#why-do-i-get-error-2-error-3 .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

This article explains why you might see the \"The Cozmo App could not
read files. Error: 2 / 3\" message.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Screenshot_2018-03-08_08.51.53.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d770304286364bc975c50/img-2828-1585280651-2036189687.png){width="797"
height="447"}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
This error message may appear if you have downloaded, installed or
updated the Cozmo app while using an SD card in your device. When
launching the app, you will not get past the loading bar screen. DDL
apps do not support devices with external memory (SD Cards, USB, etc.).
See [this
FAQ](//support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/134-compatible-devices-further-information)
for further information on compatibility.

The message may also appear because of a Google Play Store issue:
\"Stuck at Downloading\".
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Troubleshooting:

1.  Restart your device
2.  Uninstall the Cozmo app (tip: export your code lab projects first)
3.  Remove the SD card
4.  Reinstall the app
5.  If the error persists, please repeat the steps and also clear your
    Google Play Store and Google Play Service cache and data before
    reinstalling the app
:::
